attributes.action: ask the Department of Transport to review the use of traffic lights on roundabouts out of peak times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Across the country there must be many hundreds if not thousands of sets of traffic lights left on at roundabouts and junctions 24 hours day. These may be useful during peak times but out of peak time they create unnecesary delays and waste energy. Their use out of peak times should be restricted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
